mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(user_id, title, content, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.name AS username FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
